bibl.title: Summons of James C. McGuire

org.orgName: United States. Circuit Court (District of Columbia)

revisionDesc.change: changed xml id, added case id

div2.p:
District of Columbia, to wit:
The United States of America,
To the Marshal of the District of Columbia, Greeting:

We command you that you take sum: James C. McGuire admn of Dolly P. Madison late of Washington County, if shall be found within the County of Washington in your said District, and safely keep, so that you have bod before the Circuit Court of the District of Columbia, to be held for the County aforesaid, at the City of Washington, on the 4th Monday of March next to answer unto the petition for Freedom of Ralph Taylor & Catherine his wife, & Henry, Sarah, John & Ellen Taylor their children &c
Hereof fail not, at your peril, and have you then and there this writ.
Witness W Cranch Esquire, Chief Judge of our said Court, at the City of Washington, the 11" day of Novr. Anno Domini one thousand eight hundred and 52.

Service acknowledged
C S Wallach for Deft

Ralph Taylor & wife for themselves & children
vs
James C. McGuire ad. Dolly P. Madison

The clerk will please to bring the case forward to the trial docket of October Term 1852
Jos H. Bradley
atty for Petrs
C.S. Wallach
for Deft
